name: Junk Beetle
description:
The Junk Beetle must have junk to roll, right?

In this space-themed game play as a freelance garbagewoman that seeks to survive in the polluted solar system, but I shall tell you: Mallory Fortune isn’t your typical miss.

How to Play
  W  :   USE
ASD  :  MOVE
SPC  :   JUMP
(x2)     JET
LMB  :   PULL

Get the trash to the back of your ship to sell it

Credits:
Annyuzori

Thanks for playing! Any feedback would be appreciated!
